about_the_game:
Marsmare: Alienation is a thrilling metroidvania adventure game. It tells the story of a simple guy from Earth who is abducted by insidious aliens.

Wishlist the game now!

Explore the underground alien base and Mars caves

Mars is a much more mysterious planet than meets the eye. Its underworld is riddled with natural caves and tunnelsof a subterranean base.

Once in the secret laboratory, our captured hero managed to deal with the alien and avoid probing. However, this is only the very beginning of his adventures on the Red Planet!

Throughout the game you will have to explore every nook and cranny of the underground base, collect all the alien artifacts, avoid cunning traps and find a way to return home.

Fight against dangerous enemies

Playing Marsmare: Alienation, you will face a variety of enemies.

Among them are:

  • Martian scientists and military personnel;
  • Spider robots and drones;
  • Cave fauna and flora.

Each enemy requires a special approach: our hero is extremely limited in resources, so one awkward move and you'll have to return to the checkpoint.

Find a way back home

While exploring the alien base, you will discover special items: a blaster, a space suit and a jetpack. Each item will add new abilities and open the way to previously inaccessible areas.

To escape from Mars, you'll need to find the alien flying saucer (yes, yes, the same one on which you were kidnapped!), collect all the energy crystals and fuel.

A real old-school adventure

Marsmare: Alienation was developed specifically for the ZX Spectrum retro computer and took first place at the Yandex Retro Games Battle 2020 competition. And now there’s a special PC version of the game to allow as many gamers as possible to play it!

The game features two graphical modes: classic and modern. This means you can play both the original version of Marsmare: Alienation and enjoy the updated, full-color pixel graphics.

Collect items, shoot back enemies, jump over chasms, and learn to avoid dangerous traps. Save the game by activating checkpoints.

Download Marsmare: Alienation and immerse yourself in the captivating atmosphere of classic 8-bit games!

Achievements

There are 10 different achievements in the game. To unlock them all, you'll have to sweat a lot!

Still not sure?

Wishlist the game as soon as possible! So you won't miss the discount and will be able to buy the game at an even better price!

short_description: Marsmare: Alienation is a thrilling adventure of an earthling kidnapped by malevolent aliens. Improve your gear and gain new abilities as you progress through the game. Encounter numerous enemies such as Martians, robotic spiders, space slugs and flying drones.
